actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Legislation and National Security

official_title: To amend part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to exempt administrative expenses of the Social Security Administration from reduction under sequestration orders issued under this part.

summary.text: Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to exempt administrative expenses of the Social Security Administration from reduction under sequestration orders issued under emergency powers to eliminate the deficit.

titles.title: To amend part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 to exempt administrative expenses of the Social Security Administration from reduction under sequestration orders issued under this part.
